itemdesc-belt-*: Allows equiping belt bags, sheaths, quivers.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-pouch-firearms: Can hold firearms ammunition and equipment.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-pouch-sling: Can hold sling bullets and sling. Press 'R' to select sling from pouch.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-quiver-bolts: Can hold crossbow bolts and loading tools.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-quiver-javelins: Can hold javelins. Press 'R' to select javelin from quiver.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-bows: Can hold bow. Press 'R' to select bow from case.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-swords: Can store one-handed swords and maces. Press 'R' to take weapom from sheath or put it back.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-pistols: Can store pistol. Press 'R' to take pistol from sheath or put it back.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-pistolsoffhand: Can store pistol. Press 'R' to take pistol into offhand from sheath or put it back.
